outcome: /JUDGMENT IN CP 94/2016 of J.M.F.C.-1I, HOSDURG CRIME NO. 1206/2014 OF HOSDURG POLICE STATION, KASARGOD PETITIONER (S) /ACCUSED NO.5: SUMESH, AGED 33 YEARS, S/O.SUKUMARAN, ARAYI, VATTATHODU, HOSDURG V
full_text: 2s ae Ei te Pe Beasts 2017/KER/1792 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE SUNIL THOMAS THURSDAY, THE 12TH DAY OF JANUARY 2017/22ND POUSHA, 1938 Cr1.MC.No. 257 of 2017 () AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CP 94/2016 of J.M.F.C.-1I, HOSDURG CRIME NO. 1206/2014 OF HOSDURG POLICE STATION, KASARGOD PETITIONER (S) /ACCUSED NO.5: SUMESH, AGED 33 YEARS, S/O.SUKUMARAN, ARAYI, VATTATHODU, HOSDURG VILLAGE, KANHANGAD SOUTH P.O., HOSDURG TALUK. BY ADV. SRI.A.ARUNKUMAR RESPONDENT (S) /STATE: STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM 682 031. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI.AMJAD ALI THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 12-01-2017, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Pn Bee 2017/KER/1792 SUNIL THOMAS, J. Dated this the 12" day of January, 2017 ORDER The petitioner herein is the 5 accused in Crime No.1206/2014 of Hosdurg Police Station for offences punishable under Sections 143, 147, 148, 324, 427, 436, 448 read with 149 of IPC. After investigation final report was laid and the matter is now pending as C.P.No.94/2016 of Judicial First Class Magistrate Court - 1, Hosdurg. 2. Learned counsel for the petitioner submitted that, the petitioner was abroad and hence he could not participate in the proceedings. Now having came to know about the proceedings, he offers to surrender before the court below and to submit himself to the jurisdiction. His only apprehension is that, he may be detained and his bail application is not likely to be taken up on the same day. 3. Having considered the above prayer and hearing both sides, | am satisfied that the grievance of the petitioner herein is sustainable. Hence, the Crl.M.C. is disposed of with a direction that, in the event of the petitioner herein surrendering before the court below within 2 weeks from today and filing an application Bue zal pease 2017/KER/1792 Cri. M. C. No. 257 of 2017 2 for bail, the court below shall take up the bail application on the Same day and pass appropriate orders in accordance with law. The warrant, if any, issued by the court below, will be kept in abeyance till the actual date of his appearance within the above stipulated time. Sd/- SUNIL THOMAS, JUDGE. /true copy/ P. A. to Judge Pn
